name: Save Us (nuzzio)
description:
My name is Lautaro (27 years old) and this is my first game made. This is part of the first practice of a short game programming study I'm doing.

The game is very basic, considering the little knowledge that I had when starting in the world of programming.

Hope you can enjoy it.

Any comments, bugs, doubts or ideas are welcome.

Thank you.

Language: english.

Estimated playing time: 15 - 30 min.
